entry.tran: （单词）用连字符连接的，带连字符的
entry.def: A word that is hyphenated is written with a hyphen between two or more of its parts.

example.ex: ...hyphenated names such as Wong-Shong or Li-Wong.

means.word_mean: 1. (of words) combined by means of a hyphen to form a unit;
